TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MessageHeaderException extends System.ServiceModel.ProtocolException

summary.span: 處理訊息時，因無法符合有關 SOAP 訊息標頭的預期而所擲回的例外狀況 (Exception)。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when the expectations regarding headers of a SOAP message are not satisfied when the message is processed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當標頭過多或訊息的標頭遺漏時，通常會擲回這個例外狀況。This exception is typically thrown when there are too many headers or headers are missing from the message. 這會包含基礎結構標頭，例如動作和可靠訊息標頭。This can include infrastructure headers such as the Action and Reliable Message headers. 這個例外狀況衍生自 ，而後者又衍生自 。This exception derives from , which in turn derives from . 類別代表在端點與該穩定的 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 用戶端之間的通訊期間可能會擲回可修復錯誤的類別和服務應用程式應能處理。The class represents a class of recoverable errors that may be thrown during communication between endpoints and that robust Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) client and service applications are expected to handle. 若要避免由比較泛型的 處理常式來攔截比較特定的 ，請在處理 之前攔截此例外狀況 (Exception)。To prevent the more generic handler from catching the more specific , catch this exception prior to handling .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您要將錯誤訊息傳遞給使用者，請使用 建構函式。If you want to pass an error message to the user, use the constructor. 如果您要將錯誤訊息與造成例外狀況的內部例外狀況參考傳遞給使用者，請使用 建構函式。If you want to pass an error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of the exception to the user, use the constructor. 如果您要傳遞序列化資訊和資料流內容，請使用 建構函式。If you want to pass serialization information and streaming context, use the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您想要傳遞錯誤訊息給使用者時，可以使用此建構函式。Use this constructor when you want to pass an error message to the user. 訊息參數的內容應該要能夠讓目標使用者了解。The content of the message parameter should be understandable to the intended users.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，用來將資料還原序列化到 物件。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class used to deserialize data into a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在還原序列化期間呼叫這個建構函式，以還原在資料流上傳輸的例外狀況物件。This constructor is called during deserialization to restore the exception object transmitted over a stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您想要傳遞錯誤訊息和有關內部例外狀況的資訊給使用者時，請使用此建構函式。Use this constructor when you want to pass an error message and information about an inner exception up to the user. 訊息參數的內容應該要能夠讓目標使用者了解。The content of the message parameter should be understandable to the intended users. 直接因為前一個例外狀況而擲回的例外狀況可能包含對 屬性中前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception can include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回與傳遞到建構函式中相同的值，如果 `null` 屬性沒有將內部例外狀況值提供給建構函式，則會傳回 `Nothing` 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor or a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
